description: This file defines a 'Results' page component for a Lightning JS application, displaying quiz results and a restart button.

classes.name: default
classes.description: A Lightning JS component representing the results page, displaying quiz score and a restart button.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Returns the initial state configuration for the component, including positions, colors, and labels.

methods.name: components
methods.description: Returns the child components used within this page, notably the Button component.

methods.name: onInit
methods.description: Initializes the component state with the quiz score retrieved from the router state.

methods.name: onReady
methods.description: Sets up the button's onPress handler to navigate back to the main page.
